title: Postgame Show: #HesSchur
description:
Mike Schur joins us for his Stat of the Day and changes his tune on the Aaron Judge HR pursuit. Then, Billy presents Mike with an ethical dilemma that gives Dan a new idea for ANOTHER segment and 2000s running back names that make you smile.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
